00022 enum AXIS_LOCATION {
00023         AXIS_LEFT = 1,
00024         AXIS_RIGHT,
00025         AXIS_TOP,
00026         AXIS_BOTTOM,
00027 };
00028 
00029 class Axis;
00030 
00034 class AxisObserver
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         AxisObserver();
00038         virtual ~AxisObserver();
00039 
00044         virtual void AxisChanged(Axis *axis) = 0;
00045 
00050         virtual void BoundsChanged(Axis *axis) = 0;
00051 };
00052 
00056 class WXDLLIMPEXP_FREECHART Axis : public wxObject, public Observable<AxisObserver>//, public RefObject
00057 {
00058         DECLARE_CLASS(Axis)
00059 
00060         friend class Plot;
00061 public:
00066         Axis(AXIS_LOCATION location);
00067         virtual ~Axis();
00068 
00073         AXIS_LOCATION GetLocation()
00074         {
00075                 return m_location;
00076         }
00077 
00082         bool IsVertical()
00083         {
00084                 return (m_location == AXIS_LEFT) || (m_location == AXIS_RIGHT);
00085         }
00086 
00091         bool IsHorizontal()
00092         {
00093                 return !IsVertical();
00094         }
00095 
00102         void SetMargins(wxCoord marginMin, wxCoord marginMax);
00103 
00104         //
00105         // Window functions.
00106         //
00107 
00112         void SetWindowWidth(double winWidth)
00113         {
00114                 SetWindow(m_winPos, winWidth);
00115         }
00116 
00121         double GetWindowWidth()
00122         {
00123                 return m_winWidth;
00124         }
00125 
00130         void SetWindowPosition(double winPos)
00131         {
00132                 SetWindow(winPos, m_winWidth);
00133         }
00134 
00139         double GetWindowPosition()
00140         {
00141                 return m_winPos;
00142         }
00143 
00148         void SetUseWindow(bool useWin)
00149         {
00150                 if (m_useWin != useWin) {
00151                         m_useWin = useWin;
00152                         FireAxisChanged();
00153                 }
00154         }
00155 
00161         void SetWindow(double winPos, double winWidth)
00162         {
00163                 if (m_winPos != winPos || m_winWidth != winWidth) {
00164                         m_winPos = winPos;
00165                         m_winWidth = winWidth;
00166                         FireAxisChanged();
00167                 }
00168         }
00169 
00176         bool IntersectsWindow(double v0, double v1);
00177 
00184         void GetWindowBounds(double &winMin, double &winMax)
00185         {
00186                 double minValue, maxValue;
00187                 GetDataBounds(minValue, maxValue);
00188 
00189                 if (m_useWin) {
00190                         winMin = m_winPos;
00191                         winMax = wxMin(maxValue, winMin + m_winWidth);
00192                 }
00193                 else {
00194                         winMin = minValue;
00195                         winMax = maxValue;
00196                 }
00197         }
00198 
00202         void AddDataset(Dataset *dataset)
00203         {
00204                 if (AcceptDataset(dataset)) {
00205                         m_datasets.Add(dataset);
00206                 }
00207         }
00208 
00214         virtual void GetDataBounds(double &minValue, double &maxValue) = 0;
00215 
00222         virtual wxCoord GetExtent(wxDC &dc) = 0;
00223 
00229         virtual bool IsVisible(double value);
00230 
00236         virtual double BoundValue(double value);
00237 
00246         virtual wxCoord ToGraphics(wxDC &dc, int minCoord, int gRange, double value);
00247 
00256         virtual double ToData(wxDC &dc, int minCoord, int gRange, wxCoord g);
00257 
00261         virtual void UpdateBounds() = 0;
00262 
00268         virtual void Draw(wxDC &dc, wxRect rc) = 0;
00269 
00275         virtual void DrawGridLines(wxDC &dc, wxRect rcData) = 0;
00276 
00277 protected:
00285         virtual bool AcceptDataset(Dataset *dataset) = 0;
00286 
00287         DatasetArray m_datasets;
00288         wxPen m_gridLinesPen;
00289 
00290         wxCoord m_marginMin;
00291         wxCoord m_marginMax;
00292 
00293         double m_winPos;
00294         double m_winWidth;
00295         bool m_useWin;
00296 
00297         FIRE_WITH_THIS(AxisChanged);
00298         FIRE_WITH_THIS(BoundsChanged);
00299 
00300 private:
00301         AXIS_LOCATION m_location;
00302 };
